snippet: Lawmakers did not try to stop the protesters, and one legislator, Assemblywoman Aileen M. Gunther, a Democrat of Sullivan County, even took out her smartphone to capture the moment.
abstract: Lawmakers did not try to stop the protesters, and one legislator, Assemblywoman Aileen M. Gunther, a Democrat of Sullivan County, even took out her smartphone to capture the moment.
lead_paragraph: ALBANY - Two dozen protesters from the Occupy movement, which two months ago helped spur lawmakers to create a new higher-tax bracket for the wealthiest New Yorkers, disrupted a state budget hearing on Monday to push for tax increases.

headline.main: Occupy Protesters Interrupt State Budget Hearing
